      • getCurrTime

        public java.lang.String getCurrTime()
        返回:
        current time, format is yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

      • getCurrTimeWithoutYear

        public java.lang.String getCurrTimeWithoutYear()
        返回:
        current time, format is HH:mm; 24hours/12hours, without yyyy-MM-dd

      • is24Hour

        public boolean is24Hour()
